message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I would like to stay within my budget, I am still not able to increase my offer. Would $16,000 be acceptable to you?
